title: Cannot download LoL client
body:
Hello. I had some difficulties with LoL where I had to delete and uninstall everything related to it. I tried to redownload the client but it comes up with this message: riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net and the site crashes. I've tried a lot and nothing seems to be working

Thanks if you can help

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing issues downloading the patcher?

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps.

* What browser are you using?
* Have you tried using a different browser to download the patcher?
